call SOAP web service to get weather

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var noCDataInput = payload.body.GetWeatherResponse as CData replace "<![CDATA[" with "" replace "]]" with "" replace ">" with ""
var unescapeInput = noCDataInput replace "<" with "<" replace ">" with ">"
var xmlInput = read(unescapeInput, "application/xml") --- { location: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Location, time: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Time, wind: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Wind, visibility: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Visibility, skyConditions: xmlInput.NewDataSet.SkyConditions, temperature: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Temperature, dewPoint: xmlInput.NewDataSet.DewPoint, relatveHumidity: xmlInput.NewDataSet.RelativeHumidity, status: xmlInput.NewDataSet.Status }
